entry.title: SNOWFALL WARNING , Îles-de-la-Madeleine
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:50 AM AST Friday 17 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, -4.2°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Îles de la Madeleine Airport 11:48 AM AST Friday 17 February 2023
Condition: Light Snow
Temperature: -4.2°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.9 kPa falling
Visibility: 2.4 km
Humidity: 91 %
Wind Chill: -11
Dewpoint: -5.4°C
Wind: NNE 20 km/h gust 30 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Friday: Snow mixed with ice pellets. Temperature steady near minus 5.
entry.summary: Snow becoming mixed with ice pellets late this afternoon. Blowing snow over exposed areas late this afternoon. Snow and ice pellet amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind north 20 km/h becoming northeast 30 gusting to 50 early this afternoon. Temperature steady near minus 5. Wind chill near minus 13. Forecast issued 11:00 AM AST Friday 17 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Snow mixed with ice pellets. Low minus 7.
entry.summary: Snow ending overnight then cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Snow mixed with ice pellets early this evening. Blowing snow over exposed areas. Snow and ice pellet amount 10 cm. Wind northeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming north 30 gusting to 50 near midnight. Low minus 7. Wind chill near minus 16. Forecast issued 11:00 AM AST Friday 17 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday: A mix of sun and cloud. Temperature steady near minus 7.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Wind north 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming northwest 20 near noon. Temperature steady near minus 7. Wind chill near minus 16. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM AST Friday 17 February 2023
